name: Wasteland Dragon Wyrmling
speed: walk 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 50 ft.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Warped Energy Breath (Recharge 6)
text: The dragon blasts warped arcane energy in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
